extendedInfo.description: Sudoku is the most popular logic-based numbers game. The aim of the game is to place 1 to 9 into each grid cell so that each number can only appear once in each row, each column and each mini-grid.This is a simply easy-to-use sudoku game, with fresh and cool interface, very acceptable difficult levels, suitable for sudoku beginner to sudoku expert. Features:5 levels: beginner, easy, medium, difficult and expertPencil marksHints to help you complete hard onesAuto-saveMore puzzles will be comming soom!

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Its a great game & really well put together  . Its fun if u really love sudoku like me :) i really recommend it :)
reviews.author: Kevin Berries

reviews.title: Excellent app but it crashes mid-game
reviews.comment: Emailed developers, thought it was just my phone, but I see other users having the same issue. Game randomly closes itself without saving (unlike getting interrupted by a text or call where it automatically pauses). Will definitely return to give stars once this is fixed.
reviews.author: Jessica Faux

reviews.title: Sudoku fun, cool mango
reviews.comment: Great layout, very easy to use.
reviews.author: Kathy Edelman

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Easy to play.  However there seems to be no menu to change options to remove it telling me if I am wrong.  Drives me crazy.
reviews.author: Janinne Gardner

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Good fun while passing time away. The numbers are a bit small for my big fingers though. Otherwise it\'s great!
reviews.author: Clive Kirkland

reviews.title: Lots of Fun
reviews.comment: Really enjoy this game. The applause is encouraging and adds to experience. Have only tried easy and medium levels.
reviews.author: Susan Miller

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Well designed...easy to use...lots of fun.
reviews.author: Linda Hayes

reviews.title: Good game.
reviews.comment: Easy to use. Lots of levels. Great features.
reviews.author: Keith Fuscaldo

reviews.comment: Love the game!
reviews.author: Gerald Gammel

reviews.title: Run smooth
reviews.comment: Love this app..great way to pass time never have an issue with app always runs smooth on my EVO 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Best Sudoku you can find anywhere.  Great for keeping the mind active.  Love it!!!
reviews.author: Joseph Collins

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Works well and no bugs. Medium can be hard and sometimes very easy. Wish there were no delays after putting in the number.
reviews.author: Joel LeBreton

reviews.title: Great for beginners!
reviews.comment: I only recently learned to play Sudoku. Because this game has a \"beginner\" level, it had been easy for me to play and actually solve the puzzles ~ not intimidating at all. I have recommended this app to many people.  It\'s an excellent game \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205
reviews.author: Deborah Clayton

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Best sudoku app u can possibly get. \"How can you make something so similar better though\" right? Details. Everything from user friendly layout and simple but effective features to the awesome background music and ranking, this has everything u could want.
reviews.author: Tyler Lalonde

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t know how to play sudoku before I downloaded this game. Not only did it teach me how to play but it\'s so user friendly. I love this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sudoku is the best.
reviews.comment: I like this version, it shows you whether the number you put is correct or not, so for you first time players, this version is a must. Have fun.
reviews.author: Danelle Williams

reviews.title: Well done!
reviews.comment: A great game and easy to manipulate the numbers & stay organized. Just wish the lines for the main 9 quadrants were a little darker, but overall easy to read. Makes for a fun gaming experience! Gotta play!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No b.s. :-)
reviews.comment: I don\'t often give 5 stars, but this is actually what it says it is! I\'m telling everyone I know who loves this puzzle!
reviews.author: Nick Foreman

reviews.title: Completely Awesome
reviews.comment: My first time playing the game and this game app rocks. This app allows you to learn how to be successful and win in a very short amount of time. I\'m hooked!
reviews.author: Arise DawnOfTheApes

reviews.title: It\'s ok.
reviews.comment: I for the most part like it. My likes are the light numbers on dark tile, easy to read.  However I don\'t like that it takes so long to skip over to the next game at the end.  I don\'t care how long it took or how many stars I got.  I just like to play for fun.  It would also be cool if it had different options for backgrounds.
reviews.author: Nikki K
